name: They're Made of Pink (Vulpini Templar)
description:
They're Made of Pink is a shooter where you're tasked with taking down the Central Computer which has gone rogue and taken over the Facility with entities created from the mysterious Pink Essence, luckily weapons and stacking upgrades are plentiful as you climb towards the top to finish the fight.

This game made with assistance from those on my Patreon, here: https://www.patreon.com/vulpinitemplar

The music is made by Dynamite Grizzly, here: https://dynamitegrizzly.bandcamp.com/
